org.sxb.data.redis.serializer

クラス GenericToStringSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sxb.data.redis.serializer.GenericToStringSerializer<T>
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Aware, BeanNameAware, RedisSerializer<T>

    public class GenericToStringSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RedisSerializer<T>, BeanNameAware
    Generic String to byte[] (and back) serializer. Relies on the Spring ConversionService to transform objects into String and vice versa. The Strings are convert into bytes and vice-versa using the specified charset (by default UTF-8). Note: The conversion service initialization happens automatically if the class is defined as a Spring bean. Note: Does not handle nulls in any special way delegating everything to the container.
    作成者:
    Costin Leau

      • deserialize

        public T deserialize(byte[] bytes)

        Deserialize an object from the given binary data.
        定義:
        deserialize インタフェース内 RedisSerializer<T>
        パラメータ:

        戻り値:
        the equivalent object instance

      • setBeanName

        public void setBeanName(java.lang.String name)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: BeanNameAware
        Set the name of the bean in the bean factory that created this bean.

        Invoked after population of normal bean properties but before an init callback such as InitializingBean.afterPropertiesSet() or a custom init-method.

        定義:
        setBeanName インタフェース内 BeanNameAware
        パラメータ:
        name - the name of the bean in the factory. Note that this name is the actual bean name used in the factory, which may differ from the originally specified name: in particular for inner bean names, the actual bean name might have been made unique through appending "#..." suffixes. Use the BeanFactoryUtils#originalBeanName(String) method to extract the original bean name (without suffix), if desired.
